data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Wednesday 11Th February 2026- Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine-Months Ended 31St December 2025 And An Interim Dividend For The Financial Year 2025-26.
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. Wednesday 11th February 2026 has approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine-months ended 31st December 2025 and declared an interim dividend of Rs.1.20 per equity share on the face value of Rs.2/- each (60% of the paid-up equity share capital) for the financial year 2025-26.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for  Consider & Approve The Following:
1. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended On
31St December 2025 And;
2. Declaration Of Interim Dividend If Any For The Financial Year
data.news_body:
IRCON International Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 11/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the following:
1. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended on
31st December 2025 and;
2. Declaration of Interim Dividend if any for the financial year 2025-26.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Held On Wednesday 21St May 2025- Recommnedation Of Final Dividend For FY 2024-25
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors recommended a final dividend of Rs.1.00 per equity share of face value of Rs. 2/- each (50% of
the paid-up equity share capital) for the financial year 2024-25 subject to the approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company. The final dividend would be paid within 30 days from the date of its declaration at the AGM.

data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. Wednesday, 24 May, 2023, inter-alia considered the following:
1. Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31 March, 2023

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Held On 12Th November, 2021-Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September 2021 And 2Nd Interim Dividend For FY21-22
data.news_body:
It is to inform that the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. Friday, 12th November, 2021, inter-alia, has:-

1. Approved the un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2021 (These results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors at its meeting held on 12th November, 2021).

2.Declared 2nd interim dividend of Re.0.70 per equity share on the face value of Rs.2/- each (35% on the paid up equity share capital) for the financial year 2021-22.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter & Year Ended 31St March, 2021 And Recommendation Of Final Dividend.
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e.  June 30, 2021, inter alia, considered and recommended a final dividend of Rs.1.32 per share of face value of Rs.2/- each (66% of the paid-up equity share capital) for the financial year 2020-21, subject to the approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting of the Company. The final dividend would be paid within 30 days from the date of its declaration at the AGM.
